data.actual_result: The username has the color of the role. This isn't a bad idea tbh but still inconsistent with other platforms
data.expected_result: It should be consistent with Desktop and iOS and display the username as white
data.short_description: Android client is the only client that shows the usernames of welcome system messages in the color of the user's role
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable welcome messages in a server - Have someone join - Assign him a role with a color - Look at the username in the welcome message and compare with Desktop
